title: Run without building
body: Is it possible to run it directly from intellij idea without building it?
author: ekusos22

comments.body: yea you can run it by running start.java
How do I run start.java?
How do I run start.java?

> How do I run start.java?

Please learn the basics of Java before commenting. If you can't figure out how to run it, then simply don't and use the build we provide.

title: Cannot build
body: I get an error when I try to build as described, like no Cleaner class, etc. If you don't do #7 in the instructions, you can build, but you will get an error at runtime. downloaded from release will start.
author: ekusos22

comments.body: Switch the Java version in project structure to "Java 8" that should fix it :)
thank you!
Duplicate of #31

title: so.. when is sigma rebase beta gonna be released?
author: MichiHax

comments.body: Soon. i suppose we don't have an eta yet.
Hello zir, rebase has been released
Also this is an invalid issue since it's off topic / not related to Sigma Remap

title: Sigma Client Cyrptominer
body: Soooo Sigma didn't have a cryptominer..?

title: Noslow
body: eating a gapple or blocking with a sword while using noslow stops sprint in air
author: aoehakDoc

comments.body: what noslow mode are you using
it happens on all modes

> it happens on all modes

We will add keepsprint to rebase, as of right now it is just a remap to make the code more readable.

As of right now noslow can be used the same,

Otherwise most bhops do the same effect.

This is still not officially released

title: Constant Simulation Flags on Grim
body:
Only visuals were enabled. 
Tested on ac-test.
author: aoehakDoc

comments.body:
> Only visuals were enabled. Tested on ac-test.

Is it the build with viaversion implemented? If yes, are you using viaversion above 1.16.4?
Yes, and it's happening on all versions.

> Yes, and it's happening on all versions. 

the issue is bc on the released build the viaversion got broken and clientside the client is thinkin the version got changed but server-side you still spoofing 1.16.4.

There will be a public Discord server for the community as we finish the rebase.

title: Random white screen while using client.
body: A random white screen appears when using the client, causing the user to relaunch the client in order for it to function again.
author: rllydaniel

comments.body: This is a known issue
